Video content on social media

I am passionate about creating content with purpose and impact.

At the Learning Planet Institute in Paris, I was part of our internal editorial team, profiling some of our 400+ partners through social media videos, blog posts, and events. I enjoyed being able to carry these projects in a dynamic team, from conceptualisation and determining the angle of each piece of content, to editing videos in collaboration with key partners with a large online following, to publishing and monitoring the content online. This role allowed me to learn an array of skills and tools, including Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Illustrator, Wordpress, and YouTube Studio, attracting an audience of 45K+ on Instagram.
